JobRecruita Enterprise Engineering Standards

1. Visual DNA (Preserve Brand & Fix Visibility)
TYPOGRAPHY: Headings MUST use 'Heroic Bold' (editorial serif style). Body text: Proxima Nova.

COLORS: Primary Blue (#3B82F6), Primary Teal (#14B8A6).

VISIBILITY FIX: Text on glass cards MUST have font-weight: 600. Use Tailwind v4 oklch() color spacing to auto-adjust text luminance for a 4.5:1 contrast ratio.

AESTHETIC: "Liquid Lux" Glassmorphism. Cards use backdrop-blur-lg + ring-1 ring-white/20 for defined edges.

2. Mandatory 2026 Logic & Database
SCHEMA: Prisma/PostgreSQL. Tables MUST include:

Identities: Linking DIDs to Nigeria TIN (Tax ID).

AuditLogs: Article 12 traceability (match logic + human sign-off ID).

LegislativeEvents: Ontario 45-day "Duty to Inform" countdown logic.

OaaSFiscal: 25% Success Fee and 20% Retention Escrow milestones.

3. Product Content (A-Z Index)
Every page MUST feature high-conversion enterprise copy for modules including:

[A] Analytics Hub, [H] High-Risk AI Log Viewer, [M] Merge-Readiness Inbox, TIN Validation, [Z] Zero-Knowledge Protocol Gateway.
